rows.label: tlk70000055_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I've heard that the deeper the bond
between Driver and Blade, the better
they'll do in battle.

rows.label: tlk70000055_01_msg0002
rows.name:
That's because that bond has an
impact on the Blade's strength.

rows.label: tlk70000055_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I've also heard that just being
physically close to one another can
help foster that bond...

rows.label: tlk70000055_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm not a Driver, so I don't know
any more than what I've heard.
Sounds nice, though.

rows.label: tlk70000055_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Having someone you can communicate
with so well... I have to say, I'm envious.
